document.full_text: a brooklyn man has been found guilty of fraud for posing as a disabled veteran in order to win federal construction contracts worth more than $16 million, authorities said on thursday.
document.title: new york man convicted in veterans contract scam
lines_and_colors: a brooklyn man has been found guilty of fraud for posing as a disabled veteran in order to win federal construction contracts worth more than $16 million, authorities said on thursday.
